message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I know it's worth a lot to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand the value of the product to you, I need to make sure I receive a fair price for my investment. How about $10,500? This is a significant compromise from my initial offer, and I believe it's still a good deal for you.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I've thought about it and am willing to increase my offer to $10,200. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
